title: Mozilla Firefox Web Page Download Mark-Of-The-Web Protection Mechanism Failure Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows remote attackers to bypass the Mark-Of-The-Web protection mechanism on affected installations of Mozilla Firefox. User interaction is required to exploit this vulnerability in that the target must perform a specific action on a malicious page.
The specific flaw exists within the web page download functionality. An attacker can abuse the functionality to create files without the Mark-Of-The-Web. An attacker can leverage this in conjunction with other vulnerabilities to execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.
addtionnal_details: Mozilla has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/security/advisories/mfsa2024-18/#CVE-2024-3863
